sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; export const Register = ({visible, setVisible, submitHandler}) => { useEffect(() => { setVisible(false) }, []) const [state,setState] = useState({ formData: { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', password: '', conf_password: '' }, type: 'REGISTER' }) const changeHandler = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target; setState({...state, formData: {...state.formData, [name]: value}}) } return (
submitHandler(e,state)}>
setVisible(!visible)}/>
) }
